Journal.Title: Environmental science and pollution research international

Article.ArticleTitle: Correction to: The mineralization of oxalic acid and bio-treated coking wastewater by catalytic ozonation using nickel oxide.

AbstractText: In Table 1, "SO<sup>2-4</sup>" and "NO<sup>-3</sup>" should be corrected to "[Formula: see text]" and "[Formula: see text]", respectively. The original article was corrected.
